name: censoriously
content:

in a way that involves often criticizing other people: "I don't think the players handled it at all well", he said censoriously. She is censoriously critical of the frivolities of modern celebrity culture.
More examplesFewer examplesI saw her pursing her lips censoriously at the manner in which I shovelled down my food. "He is far too old to be carrying on like that", she said censoriously.
